channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump is a ‘wild card’ for the stock market, this trader says. He’s buckling up.
item.description: Volatility is the “new norm,” market pro Jeff Bierman predicts.

item.title: Gold Futures Slip as Trump Decides Against Immediate Tariffs
item.description: Gold futures fell as Trump didn’t immediately implement trade tariffs, somewhat lowering short-term, safe-haven demand for the precious metal, though ...

item.title: ‘I trust that my husband isn’t a gold digger’: I’m inheriting millions of dollars. My husband says I’m ‘selfish’ to keep it. Should I share it?
item.description: “I have been a stay-at-home mom for the past five years and my husband is the sole breadwinner.”

item.title: Oil's Recent Surge Should Prompt Caution in Trump's Sanctions Strategy
item.description: Oil was trading lower and Commerzbank Research said its rally after the latest round of U.S. sanctions on Russia’s energy sector should make Trump cau...

item.title: Oil Majors Flirt With Electricity
item.description: As power generators such as Vistra soar, oil-and-gas giants are dipping their toes into a business where they have some natural advantages.

item.title: This expert highlights what could be the macro trade of the coming years. It’s not about Trump.
item.description: The former chief currency strategist at Goldman Sachs, Robin Brooks, says this currency pairing is going to do something unexpected.

item.title: Risk of Euro Falling to Parity Versus Dollar Has Abated for Now
item.description: The euro was weaker against the dollar, but the risk of it falling below parity with the dollar in the first quarter of the year has fallen, according...

item.title: Trump’s first 100 days: What he must do on trade, immigration and tax cuts
item.description: Move fast and shake things: The time for big, bold change is short.

item.title: Stock Futures Higher as Dollar Whipsaws on Trump Tariff Plans
item.description: Stock futures stood modestly higher coming out of the long weekend.

item.title: D.R. Horton sees home supply increase, but affordability is still an issue
item.description: D.R. Horton’s stock surges toward a sixth straight gain after earnings falls but beat expectations.
